text: Abramovo () is a rural locality (a village) in Denyatinskoye Rural Settlement of Sysertsky District, Vladimir Oblast, Russia. The population was 1 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == The village is located 12 km north- east from Denyatino and 31 north-east from Melenki. == References == Category:Rural localities in Vladimir Oblast
title: Abramovo, Vladimir Oblast
